# Gaerdal Ironhand
## Overview
Name: Gaerdal Ironhand

Gender: m

Rank: Lesser Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Protection, Vigilence, Combat

Titles: The Stern, The Shield of the Golden Hills

Holy Symbol: Iron band

Alignment: LG

Origin of Worship: Gnome

Core Worshippers: Gnomes

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Warhammer (m)

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: +1 defending warhammer

Domains: Courage\* (CW), Good, Law, Nobility\* (CW, Ss), Protection, War.
